1: @@//rdzogs pa gsang ba'i mtsho skyes <mistake>la//bcu</mistake> drug cha gang de nor <mistake>bu'i//pad+mar</mistake> rdo <mistake>rje'i</mistake> rtse mor <mistake>gnas//de</mistake> <mistake>steng</mistake> 'pho ba'i dus su <mistake>'gyur //nag</mistake> <mistake>po'i</mistake> tshes gcig 'ongs pa <mistake>na//</mistake>
2: 'dod chags bral bas <mistake>gnama</mistake> stong <mistake>la// nyi</mistake> ma mdzod <mistake>spu'i</mistake> gnas su <mistake>'gro //de</mistake> yi cha shes bcu drug <mistake>ma//gtcug</mistake> tor pad+mar son pa'o // zla ba nyams pa zhes brjod <mistake>de//chags</mistake> pa'i bde la
3: chags bral <mistake>phyir//lus</mistake> can thams cad 'chi ba <mistake>na//zla</mistake> ba bdud rtsi 'og tu <mistake>'gro//steng</mistake> du nyi ma rdul sgra <mistake>gcan//rnam</mistake> shes dngos <mistake>po'i</mistake> mtshan nyid <mistake>la// de</mistake> phyir zla ba bdud rtsi <mistake>ni//steng</mistake> du bgrod bya
4: mi yi <mistake>bdag /'og</mistake> tu nyi ma rdul sgra <mistake>gcan// rnam</mistake> shes 'gyur <mistake>mid</mistake> bde ba <mistake>la//sangs</mistake> rgyas kun gyi mdzod spu <mistake>yi //pad+mar</mistake> zla ba bdud rtsi <mistake>ni//nyi</mistake> rdul <mistake>gnam</mistake> stong gsang bar <mistake>ste// gtsug</mistake> tor
5: nor bur de dag <mistake>go//zhes</mistake> pa ston pa'i rdo <mistake>rje'i</mistake> <mistake>chog /lus</mistake> can kun gyi phyin ci <mistake>log /rab</mistake> gnas mya <mistake>nan</mistake> 'das pa <mistake>min//khams</mistake> rnams phyin ci log tu <mistake>'gyur// nor</mistake> bur thugs dang gsang bar
6: <mistake>gsung/lte</mistake> bar sku ste bde chen <mistake>las//chos</mistake> dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul <mistake>pa//'di</mistake> rnams dag pa'i <mistake>skru</mistake> las spro // thabs kyi 'og tu rgyal <mistake>po'i</mistake> <mistake>dbang//shes</mistake> rab kyi ni steng du <mistake>'gyur //'di</mistake>
7: yi dpral bar <mistake>ku</mistake> rdo <mistake>rjo//mgrin</mistake> snying lte ba'i 'dam skyes <mistake>la//gsung</mistake> thugs ye shes rdo <mistake>rje</mistake> <mistake>rnams//sprul</mistake> pa la sogs 'di rnams spro // phung po khams rnams spro ba <mistake>ni // sgrib</mistake> pa med pa'i
8: bde ba <mistake>las//las</mistake> kyi phyag rgya'i snyoms 'jug <mistake>dang/ye</mistake> shes phyag rgya'i <mistake>da migs</mistake> pa <mistake>dang//pyag</mistake> rgya chen po gcig sbyor <mistake>bas//mi</mistake> 'gyur bde 'phel bar <mistake>'gyur //'phel</mistake> ba'i 'phel bar
